channel.title: [Dementhium 639] Server run problem
channel.description:
When I run the server it stops at [NPCLoader] Loading default npc spawns... I didn't do anything besides edit somethings in CombatUtils and it did this. But I just go on so I didn't try it before doing anything to the files. I seriously did nothing but give the gravite items some attack animations
[code][Cache] Loading cache... [Cache] Loaded cache! [MapXTEA] Loaded 1502 map XTEA key(s) [PacketManager] Loading packet handlers... [PacketManager] Loaded 60 packet handlers. [World] Loading World... [ClanManager] Loading clans.... [ClanManager] Loaded 0 clans. [AreaManager] Loading areas... [AreaManager] Loaded 49 areas. [NPCDropLoader] Loading drops... [NPCDropLoader] Loaded 2651 drops [SpellContainer] Loading magic spells... [SpellContainer] Loaded 43 magic spell handlers. [SpecialAttackContainer] Loading special attacks... [SpecialAttackContainer] Loaded 37 special attacks. [DialogueManager] Loading dialogues... [DialogueManager] Loaded 50 dialogues. [DialogueManager] Loading NPC dialogue ids... [DialogueManager] Loaded 1 NPC dialogue ids. [ShopManager] Loaded 37 Shops [ObjectManager] Loading objects... [ObjectManager] Loaded 14 objects. [ItemDefinition] Loading item definitions... [ItemDefinition] Loaded 21000 item definitions. [RangeWeapon] Loading range weapon info... [RangeWeapon] Loaded 184 range weapon definitions. [Ammunition] Loading range ammunition info... [Ammunition] Loaded 219 ammunition definitions. [NPCDefinition] Loading npc definitions... [NPCDefinition] Loaded 13488 npc definitions. [NPCLoader] Loading customized NPC classes... [NPCLoader] Loaded 87 customized NPCs. [NPCLoader] Loading default npc spawns... [/code]
This is what it should look like [code][Cache] Loading cache... [Cache] Loaded cache! [MapXTEA] Loaded 1502 map XTEA key(s) [PacketManager] Loading packet handlers... [PacketManager] Loaded 60 packet handlers. [World] Loading World... [ClanManager] Loading clans.... [ClanManager] Loaded 47 clans. [AreaManager] Loading areas... [AreaManager] Loaded 48 areas. [NPCDropLoader] Loading drops... [NPCDropLoader] Loaded 2649 drops [SpellContainer] Loading magic spells... [SpellContainer] Loaded 43 magic spell handlers. [SpecialAttackContainer] Loading special attacks... [SpecialAttackContainer] Loaded 37 special attacks. [DialogueManager] Loading dialogues... [DialogueManager] Loaded 35 dialogues. [DialogueManager] Loading NPC dialogue ids... [DialogueManager] Loaded 1 NPC dialogue ids. [ShopManager] Loaded 33 Shops [ObjectManager] Loading objects... [ObjectManager] Loaded 31 objects. [ItemDefinition] Loading item definitions... [ItemDefinition] Loaded 20430 item definitions. [RangeWeapon] Loading range weapon info... [RangeWeapon] Loaded 184 range weapon definitions. [Ammunition] Loading range ammunition info... [Ammunition] Loaded 219 ammunition definitions. [NPCDefinition] Loading npc definitions... [NPCDefinition] Loaded 13488 npc definitions. [NPCLoader] Loading customized NPC classes... [NPCLoader] Loaded 86 customized NPCs. [NPCLoader] Loading default npc spawns... [NPCLoader] Loaded 3727 default npc spawns. [EventManager] Loading event listeners... [EventManager] Loaded 27 interface listeners and 319 object listeners. [DementhiumShutdownHook] Shutdown hook initialized! Server bound to port - 43594 [ImpetuousImpulses] Spawned all implings: puro-puro count: 35, world count: 31 [/code]
It won't connect to the client. I couldn't give you much detail because I have no idea why this is happening... I have been doing things in playerupdate but nothing major (Titles)
